title: Love＊Scramble - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Shoujo
author: Kimura Shigenobu   木村成寿
description:
Two people who overlapped with each other was separated and are once again reunited on the day of the high school entrance ceremony. “I’ve thought of going back to normal even though I’ve grown used to my current life and there are circumstances that I can’t tell others”.
An intertwined school love story of the two of them and the classmates who look forward to each individual’s feelings of love.>
